justification: The video is edited to show a religious dramatization of the rapture, the moment some Christians believe Jesus Christ will return to Earth to bring believers to heaven.The video is one of many "rapture pre-enactments" created by the Christian organization Turning Point for God, which says it hopes to grab viewers' attention with dramatic clips.

statement: Arizona Senate “indicted” Gov. Katie Hobbs.
label: pants-fire
justification: Arizona Gov. Katie Hobbs has not been indicted by the state’s Senate. The Senate has no authority to indict anyone.The claim is based on a discredited presentation at a February legislative hearing. The House member responsible for the presentation was expelled.

statement: A video proves U.S. Attorney General Merrick Garland faces “a lying charge” after giving a fake number to Sen. John Kennedy, R-La., at a hearing.
label: pants-fire
justification: The video does not show U.S. Attorney General Merrick Garland facing a "lying charge."Learn more aboutPolitiFact's fact-checking process and rating system.

statement: Video shows a Federal Emergency Management Agency “concentration camp” in Hawaii.
label: pants-fire
justification: his isn’t a Federal Emergency Management Agency camp. It’s a tiny home community on Oahu, Hawaii, for unhoused people.Learn more aboutPolitiFact's fact-checking process and rating system.

statement: An emergency broadcast system test will “send a specific high-frequency signal … with the intention of activating graphene oxide” in people.
label: pants-fire
justification: As required by law, the Federal Emergency Management Agency will conduct a nationwide test of the Emergency Alert System and Wireless Emergency Alerts at 2:20 p.m. Eastern Standard Time on Oct. 4.Conspiracy theories have claimed that COVID-19 vaccines contain graphene oxide, but the two most widely used vaccines in the U.S., Pfizer and Moderna, do not have graphene oxide as an ingredient.There’s no mechanism by which a high-frequency signal could activate the COVID-19 vaccines’ ingredients, which are short-lived in people, an expert said.Learn more aboutPolitiFact's fact-checking process and rating system.

statement: Photo shows Hillary Clinton on a “lethal injection medical table.”
label: pants-fire
justification: This claim is unfounded.Learn more aboutPolitiFact's fact-checking process and rating system.

statement: “Janet Yellen arrested for treason.”
label: pants-fire
justification: Treasury Secretary Janet Yellen wasn’t arrested. This claim is unfounded.Learn more aboutPolitiFact's fact-checking process and rating system.

statement: “People who took the jab are technically ‘non human species.’”
label: pants-fire
justification: People don’t lose their "human" status if they get a COVID-19 vaccine.Learn more aboutPolitiFact's fact-checking process and rating system.

statement: “World leaders & elite businessmen are ingesting the blood of young children in order to achieve ‘eternal youth,’ a CBS report warns.”
label: pants-fire
justification: In 2018, CBS News reported on a clinical trial focused on transfusing blood from young donors to adults older than 35. It didn’t warn that world leaders and elite businessmen were ingesting the blood of young children.Learn more aboutPolitiFact's fact-checking process and rating system.

statement: Video proves Sen. John Fetterman has a body double.
label: pants-fire
justification: Sen. John Fetterman, D-Pa.’s tattoos on the insides of his forearms were not missing in a viral video. They were not clearly visible while he was gesturing, but were visible during other moments.Learn more aboutPolitiFact's fact-checking process and rating system.

statement: Hawaii wildfire was intentionally set because there’s “120 million tons of lithium in Maui.”
label: pants-fire
justification: Experts said there is not a significant amount of lithium in Maui or Hawaii, and there are no plans to mine lithium in that state.There’s no evidence that Maui’s wildfires were set intentionally.Learn more aboutPolitiFact's fact-checking process and rating system.

statement: “Florida sort of had a mandate because they were giving the vaccine, they were demanding everybody take the vaccine.”
label: pants-fire
justification: Starting in December 2020, Florida Gov. Ron DeSantis rolled out the COVID-19 vaccines. He initially prioritized giving the shots to residents in long-term care facilities, frontline health care workers and older Americans.PolitiFact reviewed more than two dozen DeSantis press releases and news conferences from 2020 and 2021 about the vaccine rollout. We found no instance of DeSantis mandating vaccination.DeSantis started expressing skepticism about the vaccines in 2021 and signed legislation the same year to block vaccine mandates.Learn more aboutPolitiFact's fact-checking process and rating system.

statement: Video shows Vice President Kamala Harris discussing how women should “get ahead.”
label: pants-fire
justification: This video is altered.In the original, then-presidential candidate Kamala Harris was commenting on whether to ban plastic straws in this video clip from a 2019 CNN town hall on climate change. She wasn’t discussing how women should "get ahead."Learn more aboutPolitiFact's fact-checking process and rating system.

statement: “Shocking video shows Biden wearing a skin mask.”
label: pants-fire
justification: This claim is unfounded.Learn more aboutPolitiFact's fact-checking process and rating system.

statement: Este video muestra una “fábrica de carne” humana “en America”.
label: pants-fire
justification: Las imágenes en el video son de la película de terror "American Carnage".Si ves algo que te hace preguntar: ¿es cierto?Mándanoslo por WhatsApp y nuestro equipo lo investigará, (813) 260-7595.

statement: Video shows a missile hitting the Pentagon on 9/11.
label: pants-fire
justification: There is overwhelming evidence that an American Airlines plane crashed into the Pentagon on Sept. 11, 2001, not a missile.

statement: CNN reported that “Barack Obama’s ex-boyfriend admits he was ‘prime suspect’ in gay serial killer case.”
label: pants-fire
justification: CNN didn’t report that former President Barack Obama was implicated as a suspected serial killer.

statement: Elon Musk said President Joe Biden “has one month left to live.”
label: pants-fire
justification: We found no evidence to support this claim. The video also does not provide corroborating evidence.

statement: CNN reported Sept. 7, 2023, that President Joe Biden’s family admitted “he died and was replaced by an actor in 2019.”
label: pants-fire
justification: The video was posted in 2022 by a TikTokker with a satirical account.CNN has made no such news report.

statement: Americans “currently are making less than at the height of the Great Depression.”
label: pants-fire
justification: • The claim uses 1930 income figures that captured only the richest 10% or so of Americans, which skews the comparison with typical incomes from the entire population today.• One federal statistic that the claim ignores is personal disposable income per capita. After accounting for inflation, income under this measurement is now more than six times higher than it was in 1930.• Economists say that the scale of deprivation during the Great Depression was vastly greater than today’s economy.

statement: “Marines caught FEMA operatives piling corpses into a mass gravesite at the Maui Forest Reserve.”
label: pants-fire
justification: This story was fabricated.

statement: Speaker at World Economic Forum conference proposed adding COVID-19 vaccines to water supply.
label: pants-fire
justification: A speaker at a 2022 World Economic Forum news conference did not propose adding COVID-19 vaccines to the water supply. She discussed water equity and said addressing it is in everyone’s interest, comparing it with vaccination during the COVID-19 pandemic.

statement: President Joe Biden is going to trial for “treason,” “sedition” and “crimes against humanity.”
label: pants-fire
justification: This claim is unfounded.

statement: El COVID-19 “nunca existio”.
label: pants-fire
justification: La Organización Mundial de la Salud reportó que desde alrededor de enero del 2020 hasta el 16 de agosto del 2023 han habido globalmente más de 769 millones casos confirmados de COVID-19 y más de 6 millones muertes.La OMS declaró COVID-19 como una pandemia y una emergencia de salud global en el 2020.El COVID-19 sigue siendo un virus que afecta a las personas, ya que se reportan nuevas variantes.  Una de ellas, la EG.5, se ha vuelto este mes la cepa dominante en Estados Unidos, según los Centros para el Control y la Prevención de Enfermedades (CDC, por sus siglas en inglés).Si ves algo que te hace preguntar: ¿es cierto?Mándanoslo por WhatsApp y nuestro equipo lo investigará, (813) 260-7595.

statement: Hillary Clinton was “EXECUTED December 31, 2018.”
label: pants-fire
justification: Hillary Clinton was not killed in December 2018. She has made numerous public appearances in the years since.

statement: “Military arrests FEMA Deputy Administrator Erik Hooks.”
label: pants-fire
justification: There’s no evidence that the Federal Emergency Management Agency’s deputy administrator was arrested. This claim originated on a site that regularly publishes fabricated stories.

statement: “The reality is more people are dying of bad climate change policies than they are of actual climate change.”
label: pants-fire
justification: Worldwide, extreme weather disasters made worse by climate change caused more than 2 million deaths between 1970 and 2021, the World Meteorological Organization said.Because of better warning systems, death rates from weather disasters have declined over the past 50 years. Some climate change skeptics have misconstrued this as evidence against climate change.

statement: “New global virus called ID-10T is spreading quickly.”
label: pants-fire
justification: This claim originated on a satire site.

statement: “Marines neutralize fleeing FEMA convoy in Maui.”
label: pants-fire
justification: This story was fabricated.

statement: “Official statement — Putin assassinated in the Kremlin!”
label: pants-fire
justification: There is no evidence that Russia’s president was assassinated.

statement: “Michelle Obama finally responds to Obama’s hidden gay secret.”
label: pants-fire
justification: This claim is unfounded.

statement: “Military arrests Pfizer CEO Albert Bourla.”
label: pants-fire
justification: There is no evidence Pfizer CEO Albert Bourla was "captured" by the U.S. Marine Corps.The article was published by Real Raw News, a website that publishes "humor, parody and satire" and has a history of posting false information.

statement: COVID-19 vaccines have killed 676,000 Americans.
label: pants-fire
justification: An anti-vaccine activist whose claims have been repeatedly debunked falsely stated that federal data shows that COVID-19 vaccines killed 676,000 people in the U.S.The data, which comes from a reporting system that includes unverified reports and can include information that is incomplete or inaccurate, cannot be used to conclude that the vaccines caused death, officials say.The federal Centers for Disease Control and Prevention has confirmed nine deaths linked to a COVID-19 vaccine that is no longer available in the U.S.

statement: “Hiroshima and Nagasaki were never nuked.”
label: pants-fire
justification: The United States dropped atomic bombs on Hiroshima and Nagasaki in Japan in August 1945.

statement: BBC News reported that British residents “no longer need to work” thanks to an investment project from Elon Musk.
label: pants-fire
justification: This video was altered and the claims in it are false.

statement: Video showing celebrities, politicians and other notable figures with black eyes proves they are part of the Illuminati.
label: pants-fire
justification: The Illuminati is a centuries-old conspiracy about a secret society of elites that controls the world.A more recent theory baselessly says newsmakers photographed with black eyes have them as part of an initiation into the Illuminati.The vast majority of the black eyes on people seen in a video making this claim have simple explanations, such as accidents or stage makeup.

statement: “King Charles exposed at Buckingham Palace as ancient reptilian shapeshifter.”
label: pants-fire
justification: King Charles III is a human, not a reptile.

statement: "No hay calentamiento global, de hecho las gráficas indican que nos estamos enfriando cada vez más”.
label: pants-fire
justification: La NASA dice que el calentamiento global es real y que la actividad humana es la causa principal.Gráficas de la ​​Oficina Nacional de Administración Oceánica y Atmosférica muestran que la temperatura de la tierra está calentándose, no enfriándose.PolitiFact no encontró gráficas de fuentes verídicas que muestren a la tierra enfriándose.Si ves algo que te hace preguntar: ¿es cierto?Mándanoslo por WhatsApp y nuestro equipo lo investigará, (813) 260-7595.

statement: Borax can be used to treat a variety of health problems, including joint pain, kidney stones, osteoporosis and chronic fatigue.
label: pants-fire
justification: The cleaning product borax should not be consumed as an alternative to boron supplements or naturally occurring boron in foods, experts said. Ingesting borax can cause gastrointestinal problems, rashes, headaches and convulsions. Consuming large amounts could lead to death.Boron is a naturally occurring mineral in many foods, and the average person gets enough boron just from eating a healthy diet, experts said.

statement: Video shows a van “‘Queer testing’ kids without parental approval … (that) involves clothing removal.”
label: pants-fire
justification: A Facebook video suggested that children were being "queer tested" without parental approval. The video shows what appears to be a van LabQ Diagnostics used for COVID-19 testing.We found the same video shared in April 2022 with different text that said students were being tested for COVID-19.The video does not explain what it means by "queer testing," and we found nothing to suggest such a test exists.

statement: “There is no such thing as a trans kid.”
label: pants-fire
justification: The existence of transgender youth is globally acknowledged in medical literature and diagnostic tools. This was established several decades ago.Most U.S. leading professional medical associations acknowledge the existence of transgender youth and support continued access to gender-affirming care.Gender identity develops in childhood, and many trans people report realizing their identities in childhood or adolescence.

statement: Tafari Campbell, the Obamas’ personal chef who drowned, tweeted that he had “information that will lead to the arrest of Barack Obama.”
label: pants-fire
justification: Tafari Campbell, a personal chef to the Obama family, was found dead July 24 after he drowned in a paddleboarding accident in Martha’s Vineyard. He was 45.Social media posts claimed Campbell tweeted that he had information that would lead to former President Barack Obama’s arrest. But that tweet was fabricated.

statement: “US Navy SEALs are arresting Ron DeSantis” for running a child sex trafficking ring.
label: pants-fire
justification: There is no proof that Florida Gov. Ron DeSantis was arrested July 25. He was in a car crash the same day but was uninjured.

statement: MSNBC’s Joy Reid hawked diet gummies in an interview with CNN’s Anderson Cooper.
label: pants-fire
justification: A video that claimed to show MSNBC host Joy Reid being interviewed by CNN’s Anderson Cooper about her weight loss success using diet gummies is a deepfake.Reid said on Facebook the video isn’t real, and a CNN spokesperson confirmed that the interview did not happen.

statement: Former President Donald Trump recently dispatched troops to the border.
label: pants-fire
justification: Former President Donald Trump didn’t just send troops to the U.S.-Mexico border, nor does he have the authority to take such action.

statement: No human remains or aircraft debris were found at the Pentagon or in Pennsylvania after the Sept. 11, 2001, attacks.
label: pants-fire
justification: Human remains and aircraft debris were recovered from both 9/11 sites.

statement: “COVID-19 is targeted to attack Caucasians and Black people. The people who are most immune are Ashkenazi Jews and Chinese.”
label: pants-fire
justification: Most disparities in COVID-19 infection and mortality, as well as for other health problems, result from severe social, economic and health inequities.Although there is still debate on the origins of the COVID-19 virus, there is no evidence it was a deliberately engineered ethnic bioweapon designed to spare or target certain races or ethnicities.

statement: The World Economic Forum “bans natural conception” because “all babies must be lab-grown by 2030.”
label: pants-fire
justification: We found no evidence the World Economic Forum is trying to ban natural conception and mandate lab-grown babies. The organization has also said these claims are false.

statement: Video shows “footage of an actual demonic possession in 1896.”
label: pants-fire
justification: This video was created by French artist MBG Core.

statement: Ohio replaced lethal injection “with a system that quickly and humanely rips off the heads of death-row inmates using powerful robotic arms.”
label: pants-fire
justification: An Instagram video about Ohio’s new plan for prisoners on death row was produced by The Onion, an outlet known for its satirical headlines and stories.

statement: “No human is allowed to travel to Antarctica.”
label: pants-fire
justification: Humans may travel to Antarctica, and scientists among others live there on a rotating basis.

statement: “Donald Trump and Joe Biden both died years ago.”
label: pants-fire
justification: Both former President Donald Trump and President Joe Biden are alive.

statement: "Zero Amish children diagnosed with cancer, diabetes or autism."
label: pants-fire
justification: Experts, studies and news coverage show that there are not "zero" Amish children diagnosed with cancer, diabetes and autism.

statement: The Associated Press reported that cameras show a TikTok influencer leaving a bag of cocaine in the West Wing of the White House.
label: pants-fire
justification: The image in the TikTok video was manipulated. An Associated Press article with this headline does not exist.The investigation into the discovery of cocaine at the White House continues, and the U.S. Secret Service has not publicly announced its findings.

statement: El logo de Threads oculta “el número de la bestia” 666.
label: pants-fire
justification: El logo de Threads, la nueva red social de Meta, no oculta el "número de la bestia", "666".Este logo invoca el signo de @, y esto fue confirmado por el Jefe de Instagram, Adam Mosseri.

statement: U.S. Rep. Marjorie Taylor Greene said, “How can the Titanic submersible run out of air if you breathe both in and out? I feel like this is more fake news BS.”
label: pants-fire
justification: This quote originated on a parody Twitter account. We found no evidence that U.S. Rep. Marjorie Taylor Greene, R-Ga., said such a thing.

statement: Video shows the city of San Diego displaying a flag supportive of pedophilia.
label: pants-fire
justification: A progress pride flag was displayed at Balboa Park in San Diego for Pride Month, but its colors don’t represent pedophiles.

statement: Photos prove former Vice President Mike Pence and King Charles III have clones.
label: pants-fire
justification: These claims are unfounded.

statement: John Podesta is the son of Laurance Rockefeller.
label: pants-fire
justification: John Podesta is not Laurance Rockefeller’s son.

statement: Video shows President Joe Biden apologizing for flatulence.
label: pants-fire
justification: This video was altered.

statement: Florida Gov. Ron DeSantis said in his yearbook that his “Mount Rushmore is Jesus, Sir-Mixes-a-Lot, and Nintendo 64.”
label: pants-fire
justification: This quote doesn’t appear in the Dunedin High School yearbook, according to Pinellas County Schools.

statement: The Wall Street Journal reporting proves that “Pizzagate” is real.
label: pants-fire
justification: The Wall Street Journal didn’t confirm that the debunked Pizzagate conspiracy theory is real. The newspaper recently reported that Instagram allowed a network of accounts that commission and purchase underage-sex content to connect with one another and promote their content. Some of these accounts use emojis as code language, including an image for "cheese pizza."One of The Wall Street Journal’s reporters dismissed the claims.The Pizzagate conspiracy theory — which claims that former Secretary of State Hillary Clinton, and those around her, ran a child sex-trafficking ring in a Washington, D.C., pizzeria’s basement — remains baseless.

statement: Former President Barack Obama “is being sent to Gitmo.”
label: pants-fire
justification: There is no evidence that former President Barack Obama is being sent to Guantanamo Bay to be imprisoned.After a video was posted July 4 making the claim, a July 6 Instagram post showed Obama visiting Athens, Greece, to attend an event.

statement: “El Titanic no se hundió en 1912 sino que fue el Olympic, otro transatlántico casi idéntico el que se hundió”.
label: pants-fire
justification: El Olympic y el Titanic eran cruceros transatlánticos de la compañía White Star Line.Cada crucero tiene un número de identificación de construcción en varias partes para identificarlo; el Titanic usaba el número 401, mientras que el Olympic usaba el 400.El video dice que el crucero fue hundido para obtener el dinero de su póliza de seguro, pero la póliza no aseguraba el valor entero de la construcción ($7.5 millones) sino sólo $5 millones.

statement: President Joe Biden died and Vice President Kamala Harris was sworn into office.
label: pants-fire
justification: Joe Biden is not dead. He remains U.S. president.

statement: The World Economic Forum "wants to slaughter millions of pet cats and dogs to fight climate change."
label: pants-fire
justification: We found no mention of killing pets on the World Economic Forum’s Twitter account or website.The organization said the claim was unfounded when it first surfaced in December.

statement: Garth Brooks played to a “half-empty arena” in Illinois.
label: pants-fire
justification: This story originated on The Dunning-Kruger Times, a website that publishes what it describes as satirical articles.

statement: Joan Rivers fue asesinada por decir que Michelle Obama es trans.
label: pants-fire
justification: Joan Rivers murió por complicaciones después de tener un procedimiento médico.Las declaraciones de Rivers fueron en broma, dijo su representante a CNN en 2014.

statement: J.P. Morgan y la familia Rothschild planificaron que el Titanic se hundiera para eliminar a Jacob Astor y crear la Reserva Federal.
label: pants-fire
justification: Hay un consenso entre historiadores y expertos que el Titanic se hundió accidentalmente.Expertos dicen que las altas velocidades, un giro equivocado, las condiciones de clima, la alerta ignorada de un iceberg y la falta de binoculares y botes salvavidas contribuyeron a la tragedia.John Jacob Astor, un magnate y promotor inmobiliario, murió en el accidente. Pero no hay evidencia de que este hombre estuviera en contra de la creación de la Reserva Federal.

statement: Video showing someone in military gear outside a Georgia Waffle House proves that Donald Trump is president.
label: pants-fire
justification: Donald Trump lost the 2020 election. Joe Biden is president.Former presidents are entitled to lifetime protection by the Secret Service, thanks to legislation passed by Congress in 1965.The Columbus Police Department in Georgia confirmed it provided a motorcade for Trump on June 10.

statement: John F. Kennedy está vivo.
label: pants-fire
justification: El 22 de noviembre de 1963 el presidente John F. Kennedy fue asesinado en Dallas, Texas mientras formaba parte de un desfile en su honor.Fue sepultado en el Cementerio Nacional de Arlington en Virginia tres días después.Una búsqueda del nombre veterano Rusell Pickett lleva a una página de la Biblioteca del Congreso, la cual compila una serie de videos describiendo su servicio durante la Segunda Guerra Mundial. Él falleció en el 2020.

statement: NASA space rockets can’t reach space.
label: pants-fire
justification: NASA rockets have reached space numerous times.

statement: Image shows Donald Trump golfing.
label: pants-fire
justification: An image shared on Twitter by Rep. Jared Moskowitz, D-Fla., purports to show former President Donald Trump golfing.It’s an altered image debunked years ago.

statement: The Guantanamo Bay detention camp remaining open is proof that Joe Biden is not the president.
label: pants-fire
justification: Joe Biden is president.

statement: In 2020 the ballots that were counted "were fake ballots."
label: pants-fire
justification: Fake ballots are extremely rare, and there is no sign they were used during the 2020 election. There are many security measures to ensure that eligible voters cast legitimate ballots.Dozens of court rulings rejected allegations of mass voter fraud in 2020.There are isolated instances of voter fraud in every election cycle, but audits show the cases detected in 2020 were not enough to change the election’s outcome.

statement: “Man sues McDonalds for still being depressed after eating happy meal.”
label: pants-fire
justification: This originated on a self-described satire site.

statement: A video shows a child yelling an expletive at President Joe Biden.
label: pants-fire
justification: This video was altered.

statement: Image shows a fall revealing President Joe Biden’s diaper.
label: pants-fire
justification: This image was altered.

statement: "Panico en Moscu Putin anuncia que Ucrania toma la ciudad".
label: pants-fire
justification: Un video en Facebook anuncia que la ciudad de Moscú ha sido tomada por Ucrania.Sin embargo, no hay evidencia de que la capital de Rusia haya sido conquistada por Ucrania.

statement: The military arrested the administrator of the Small Business Administration.
label: pants-fire
justification: This is fabricated.

statement: Former President Donald Trump rescued deformed children who were born into sex slavery in tunnels under Central Park in New York.
label: pants-fire
justification: There’s no evidence to support this claim.The proof the Facebook post offers includes images of a supposed site where children were rescued; it was actually a COVID-19 field hospital.

statement: Trump "hasn't been 'indicted.' It's all part of the Operation.”
label: pants-fire
justification: A federal grand jury indicted former President Donald Trump on 37 counts relating to the mishandling of classified documents. Trump is expected in court June 13.

statement: “There is no war in Ukraine.”
label: pants-fire
justification: The war in Ukraine is real and continuing, despite social media posts claiming otherwise.

statement: “Cocaine, porn, evidence of child trafficking found in (Gov. Gretchen) Whitmer’s car.”
label: pants-fire
justification: This story was fabricated.

statement: “Military, Trump thwart deep state blackout.”
label: pants-fire
justification: This claim is unfounded.

statement: Amazon’s “Utopia” TV series predicted the COVID-19 pandemic and an intentional effort to sterilize humans, showing the pandemic was planned.
label: pants-fire
justification: The 2020 conspiracy-thriller TV series "Utopia" did not predict the COVID-19 pandemic, or prove that the outbreak was planned or that the vaccines cause infertility.The show’s creator said it is a work of fiction written in 2013.Research has found that COVID-19 vaccines do not affect fertility.

statement: Boiling tap water causes fluoride in the water to be “more toxic.”
label: pants-fire
justification: Boiling tap water does not transform flouride in the water and does not make the water toxic.Boiling water can kill contaminants.

statement: The blue, pink, and white colors in the progress pride flag represent pedophiles
label: pants-fire
justification: The light blue, pink and white colors featured in the new and popular progress pride flag represent the transgender community whose flag features the same color.The colors do not represent people who are attracted to children or virgins.

statement: "F.ight BREAKS as C.omer SHUTS UP Biden's lawyer with B0MBSHELL."
label: pants-fire
justification: A Facebook video did not show a fight break out during a congressional hearing.The video is a clip from a Feb. 8 U.S. House Oversight and Accountability committee hearing, where former Twitter executives testified about their roles in limiting tweets about a New York Post story on Hunter Biden’s laptop.

statement: Video shows Rep. Nancy Pelosi being arrested.
label: pants-fire
justification: The video shows Rep. Nancy Pelosi, D-Calif., leaving her San Francisco home and getting into her car.

statement: "Estelas de aviones ... están modificadas con químicos por gobiernos poderosos para enfermar a las personas con fines económicos manipulativos y de reducción de la población".
